com.rexsl.log

Class HttpFeeder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rexsl.log.AbstractHttpFeeder
      • com.rexsl.log.HttpFeeder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feeder, Closeable, AutoCloseable, OptionHandler

    public final class HttpFeeder
extends AbstractHttpFeeder
    Feeder through HTTP POST request.

    The feeder can be configured to split all incoming texts to single lines and post them to the configured URL one by one. This mechanism may be required for some cloud logging platforms, for example for loggly.com (read their forum post about this problem). You enable splitting by split option set to TRUE.

    The class is thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.3.2
    Version:
    $Id: HttpFeeder.java 1558 2012-05-01 20:34:21Z guard $
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@rexsl.com)
